meaningMnemonic: The <radical>reality</radical> of <radical>gold</radical> is that it has the power to <kanji>tranquilize</kanji> anyone who gets their hands on it. Gold may seem cool to have in movies and songs, but in reality, it has the power to mess you up!
readingMnemonic: You've been <kanji>tranquilize</kanji>d and now drool is running down your <reading>chin</reading> (ちん). It's actually really gross. But you don't care, look at all this gold! No one will care about your chin when you're rich!
